article:
'Reactance' may refer to:

* Electrical reactance, the opposition to a change in voltage due to capacitance
  (capacitive reactance) or in current due to inductance (inductive reactance)
* Magnetic reactance, a similar effect in magnetism
* Reactance (psychology), an emotional reaction to pressure or persuasion that
  results in the strengthening or adoption of a contrary belief
* Reactivity (chemistry), the rate at which a chemical substance tends to
  undergo a chemical reaction
